## Queue3.on() method

A job has been marked as stalled. This is useful for debugging job workers that crash or pause the event loop.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
on(event: 'stalled', callback: StalledEventCallback3<T>): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  event | 'stalled' |  |
|  callback | [StalledEventCallback3](./bullmq.stalledeventcallback3.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

this
